programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft is a tomb raider, who collects ancient relics from ruined cities and temples around the world. With her impressive hand-to-hand combat skills, weapon talents and her ability to speak several languages, she faces her enemies in her mission to find an ancient artifact that gives its owner the ability to control time.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Robin Longstride along with his band of his mercenaries set out to unite the people of England to stand up to the invading French forces led by King Philip.(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens misinterpret video-feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth using the games as models for their various assaults. The president decides to seek help from an old friend, who had also been romantically involved with his wife in the past, and who happens to be a former 1980s video game champion, by assigning him to lead a team of old-school arcaders to defeat the aliens.(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: A scientist is exposed to Gamma rays while conducting his research, which makes him change into the Green Hulk when he gets angry, causing plenty of damage. He tries to find a cure for his condition, while other parties decide to turn their men into hulks too. Thus, the Hulk is forced to face an enemy of his own strength.(n)

programme.title: Ghorba
programme.desc: Set during the 1950s and 1960s, this series chronicles the love story between a stage actor and the daughter of the chief of a small village. As their love gets tested and goes through unexpected hurdles, the series reflects the class struggle during that era.(n)

programme.title: Sultanet Al-Mo'ez
programme.desc: Set in a local neighborhood, Sultana, a lady who runs the small offal restaurant she inherited from her father, becomes influential in the lives of her siblings and the people of the neighborhood alike, but her life changes drastically when she falls in love.(n)

programme.title: Hayat Sarkisi
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.(n)

programme.title: School Spirits
programme.desc: A nasty surprise awaits a young girl when she discovers that the town she just moved to is inhabited by ghosts. Now that she is aware of the reason behind the spooky occurrences in town, it's up to her and a few classmates to save the town's children from an evil apparition.(n)

programme.title: Half Nelson
programme.desc: Two lost souls find solace in each other after Drey uncovers the drug habit of her history teacher, Dan. The awkward situation quickly develops into a friendship that proves crucial for the survival of both of them.(n)

programme.title: Renovation of the Heart/It's a Fixer Upper
programme.desc: When the couple Dan and Anne Dover find themselves in financial difficulty, they decide to sell Anne's family house to fix their problem. But things take an unexpected turn when they set out to renovate the house first before they put it up for sale.(n)

programme.title: The Work Wife
programme.desc: After a stressful time for the married couple Sean and Lisa, things start to get better, when he gets a new job. But when Sean's assistant develops an obsession with him, she will stop at nothing to have him for herself.(n)

programme.title: The Forgiven
programme.desc: After the end of apartheid in South Africa, Archbishop Desmond Tutu meets a brutal murderer who seeks salvation and forgiveness for the crimes he committed.(n)

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.(n)

programme.title: D.A.R.Y.L.
programme.desc: When a family finds a boy who lost his memory and takes him in, they slowly discover that he possesses special abilities that make him anything but human.(n)

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Becoming the sole witness of a murder committed by a mobster turns Deloris Wilson's life upside down. Forced to go on the run, a police lieutenant puts her in witness protection and places her inside a convent under the disguise of a nun.(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones

programme.title: Zoo

programme.title: Baby Geniuses

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel chased the Smurfs out of their home so they head to Central Park and get help from Patrick and Grace who help them return to their village and eventsts unfold.(n)

programme.title: My Pet Dinosaur

programme.desc: The legendary Lightning McQueen is shocked when he is pushed out from the sport he has loved and conquered for many years; as he faces a new generation of extremely fast race cars.ars. With the help of a young experienced team he tries to find his way back to t.(n)

programme.title: First Kid
programme.desc: A former boxer becomes a secret agent who is assigned to protect the president's son, who seems determined to make life difficult for his new protector.(n)

programme.desc: As the descendant of a long family of master criminals, Artemis Fowl II finds himself on the hunt for his missing father, becoming entangled with dwarves and fairies as he seeks to locate the gang of fairies that kidnapped his father.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella III: A Twist in Time
programme.desc: Lady Tremaine gets the Fairy Godmother's wand, and goes back in time to the day when the prince was searching for Cinderella by her glass slipper that she left in the a party at midnight. She enlarges it to fit one of the step daughters, erasing the prince's memory, and Cinderella must stop her evil scheme and defend her love for the prince.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Lewis is a 12-year old orphan, who is also a talented genius, able to create all kinds of amazing inventions. He invents a time-machine so he could meet his dead mother, and when he starts his journey, he discovers that he is in the future and not in the past. He meets Wilbur who introduces him to the Robinsons, resulting in a whole new world of adventures.(n)

programme.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
programme.desc: The story of 11-year-old boy Alexander and his bad day, which begins with chewing gum stuck in his hair, followed by more bad things. He begins to wonder if he's the only one going through this. Till he discovers that the rest of his family are also having a bad day in a way he has never seen before.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
programme.desc: When a vengeful rival from his past makes a sudden return, Captain Jack Sparrow must figure out a way to escape the deadly ghosts unleashed by Captain Salazar. His only hope lies in locating the Trident of Poseidon in a journey filled with danger and strife.(n)

programme.title: Up
programme.desc: By tying thousands of balloons to the roof of his house, elderly Carl intends to make his dream of seeing South America's prairies come true. When he takes off, he realizes that he is not alone on his trip, for little Russel unintentionally came along for the ride.(n)

programme.title: Atlantis: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Both Milo and Kida are together again with their friends to investigate strange events related to the sunken secrets of Atlantis.(n)

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: Joe is a gorilla child raised by a girl to grow up and become a gorilla so enormous and famous. Two men from an environmental agency in California come to search for him, convincing the girl about providing a facility to protect him. She agrees to send him there, and indeed he is transported there, to realize that he's being held captive. He escapes from there and vandalizes in revenge.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Disney animated fairy tale in which Belle is a bright and independent young girl who is taken captive by a beast in his castle in exchange for releasing her father who accidentally trespassed into that castle. Despite her fear, she learns to befriend the castle's enchanted staff and is able to see beyond the beast's exterior to realise the true heart of the prince within. Belle and the beast fall in love when Gaston, an arrogant hunter, sets out to hunt the beast and take Belle to himself at any cost.(n)

programme.title: Herbie Fully Loaded
programme.desc: Maggie Peyton is a recent college graduate who is preparing for a reputable job at a sports channel. The Peyton family specializes in winning NASCAR races, and her father refuses to allow her to participate due to the dangerous nature of the races. Eventually she comes across Herbie, a Volkswagon, at a junkyard, and discovers the car's super abilities that could help her win the race.(n)

programme.title: Crown Vic
programme.desc: As the veteran cop Ray Mandel takes his rookie partner on patrol, the night turns into an eventful one as two criminals kill cops and prowl the streets for more victims, all while a girl goes missing and a rogue cop threatens to make the tense situation in the streets worse.(n)
